==Walkthrough==
# Enter the Domain
# Go straight ahead
# Defeat opponents {{Enemy List|Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard;Hilichurl Fighter*2}}
# Activate the Pyro Elemental Monument to unlock the door
#* The door will only be open while the monument is active.
# Defeat opponents {{Enemy List|Cryo Hilichurl Shooter;Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl;Cryo Slime*2;Hilichurl Grenadier*3}}
#*An Exquisite Chest is unlocked after defeating opponents
# Climb up the wall where the ice was
# Activate the Pyro Elemental Monument to unlock the door
# Defeat opponents {{Enemy List|Cryo Slime*6}}
# Go through the hallway while avoiding falling icicles and defeating Cryo Slimes {{Enemy List|Cryo Slime*4}}
#* There is a Common Chest here
# Head up the stairs and defeat opponents while avoiding icicles {{Enemy List|Cryo Slime*4}}
# Door to the next room unlocks
# Activate four Pyro Elemental Monuments to unlock the door
# Defeat {{Enemy|Cryo Regisvine}} - We Could Make A Cold Dish?
#* A Precious Chest appears after defeating opponent
# Talk to Xiangling
# Leave Domain
# Complete Quest
